name: Kofi Kinaata
description: '''Martin King Arthur''' (born 15 April 1990), popularly known as '''Kofi Kinaata''', is a [[Ghanaian]] [[musician]] and [[songwriter]] from [[Takoradi]]. Known for his [[Fante people|Fante]] [[Rapping|rap]] and freestyle, he is often referred to by the moniker of ''Fante Rap God'' (FRG).
